title: Calcium Stearate
overview: Calcium stearate is a white, fine powder with a slightly soapy feel. It is produced from the reaction of stearic acid (derived from animal or vegetable sources) with calcium hydroxide. Calcium stearate functions primarily as a lubricant, release agent, and flow aid.

specifications.value: Sum of stearic acid and palmitic acid NLT 90.0% of total content

features: Excellent lubricant properties: Reduces friction between particles and against manufacturing equipment
Anti-adherent: Prevents active ingredients and excipients from sticking to processing equipment
Enhances flowability: Improves powder flow in tableting and capsule filling
Water-repellent: Can provide a degree of moisture resistance

applications.title: Pharmaceutical
applications.description: Lubricant for tablet and capsule production, reducing wear on equipment and preventing sticking

applications.title: Nutraceutical
applications.description: Similar uses as in pharmaceuticals to enhance production efficiency

applications.title: Cosmetics
applications.description: Thickener, emulsifier, and texture enhancer in personal care products

applications.title: Industrial
applications.description: Lubricant and processing aid in plastics, rubber, and other manufacturing industries
